original_title: Triple-win for Browns Battery at SLIM National Awards 2023
original_body_lines: Browns Battery & Tyres, a premier provider of automotive solutions in Sri Lanka, recently garnered accolades at the annual SLIM National Sales Awards. The company clinched a triumphant trifecta within the automotive sector, with Lakshman Sanjeewa securing a Silver in the Frontliner category, while Nuwan Koggalage and Senaka Gunathilake were honoured with Bronze and Merit awards, respectively.

Expressing pride at the team’s outstanding achievement, Ajith De Silva – Chief Operating Officer, Automotive & Hardware Cluster – Browns Group stated, “At Browns, we are committed to empowering our sales staff with cutting-edge trends and technical innovations. Our nurturing environment fuels their passions, motivating them not only to achieve their goals, but to surpass their personal bests. I confidently affirm that the Browns Battery and Tyre Sales Team stands unrivalled in the automotive sector.
